field.name: summary
field.value: Created CompositeKey class adds attribute NotNull=true causes error

field.name: description
field.value:
Created CompositeKey class adds attribute NotNull=true which throws a mapping schema error.
->[KeyProperty(Column="id", ColumnType="Guid", NotNull=true)]
The 'not-null' attribute is not declared. Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.
Exception Details: System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException: The 'not-null' attribute is not declared.
